solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public boolean isPalindrome(String s) {--newline--        if (s.isEmpty()) {--newline--            return true;--newline--        }--newline--        int head = 0, tail = s.length() - 1;--newline--        char cHead, cTail;--newline--        while(head <= tail) {--newline--            cHead = s.charAt(head);--newline--            cTail = s.charAt(tail);--newline--            if (!Character.isLetterOrDigit(cHead)) {--newline--                head++;--newline--            } else if(!Character.isLetterOrDigit(cTail)) {--newline--                tail--;--newline--            } else {--newline--                if (Character.toLowerCase(cHead) != Character.toLowerCase(cTail)) {--newline--                    return false;--newline--                }--newline--                head++;--newline--                tail--;--newline--            }--newline--        }--newline--        --newline--        return true;--newline--    }--newline--}
